sense.name: quality
sense.commentary: The quality that renders something desirable or useful or important
sense.examples: The Shakespearean Shylock is of dubious value in the modern world. George makes rude comments for shock value.

sense.name: quantity
sense.commentary: An established numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed, also the amount of money that is considered to be a fair equivalent for something else.
sense.examples: The value assigned was 16 milliseconds. He tried to estimate the value of the produce at normal prices.

sense.name: moral principal
sense.commentary: An ideal accepted by some individual or group

sense.name: duration of a musical note
sense.commentary: The relative duration of a musical note, time value, note value
sense.examples: The music notes with the flag have a shorter time-value. Triplets take up the same space as two notes of that value.

sense.name: relative darkness
sense.commentary: Relative darkness or lightness of a color
sense.examples: I establish the colors and principal values by organizing the painting into three values - dark, medium... and light"- Joe Hing Lowe
